testcase.name: Testing of POST API
testcase.system-out: * url TYPICODE_IP ......................................................... passed * def constants = read('classpath:endpoints.js') .......................... passed * def api_response = read('classpath:response/postApi/response.json') ..... passed * def api_request = read('classpath:request/postApi/request.json') ........ passed Given path constants['CREATE_NEW_USER'] ................................... passed And header Content-Type = 'application/json' .............................. passed And request api_request ................................................... passed When method post .......................................................... passed Then status 201 ........................................................... passed And match response == api_response ........................................ passed
